title: "There was a problem patching League of Legends. We'll restore a backup version and try updating..."
body:
"There was a problem patching League of Legends. We'll restore a backup version and try updating again after u restart the patcher ."
RESTART
"We have restored the installation to another version of League of Legends. Now we will try to patch it to the latest version"
"There was a problem patching League of Legends. We'll restore a backup version and try updating again after u restart the patcher ."
RESTART
"We have restored the installation to another version of League of Legends. Now we will try to patch it to the latest version"
"There was a problem patching League of Legends. We'll restore a backup version and try updating again after u restart the patcher ."
RESTART ......
And this goes on and on forever. 
RIOT WHAT DO I DOOOOOO ???

replies.body: Hey there guys, same thing happened to me actually 5 mins ago, closing the client and re-opening it through LeagueClient.exe in LoL folder as administrator helped to me, maybe it will help you too. :)
I just tried that but I'm stuck at 'calculating differences: 1 file scanned' with 33% complete. It's been like that for a while now.
God bless
Try to change DNS to 208.67.222.222 / 208.67.220.220 worked for me
worked for me thanks !

The steps I id to get it working again.
1) When the League Client  is saying that "There is a problem...", open Task Manager by pressing Ctrl+Shift+Esc.
2) Go to the "Processes" tab a the top, then locate "LeagueClient..."
3) Left click on that, then go to the "End Process" button at the bottom right
4) Confirm to end the process, then open up the client again

:) If this helps, you are welcome!

I have the same problem . I am stuck  in a loop . And nothing warks . 
But I did managed to play a game of URF before that loop started again . All I did was reinstalling  LOL . Thats not an option anymore .
Hey dude im having this issue right now and it seems like u fix'd it can u please tell me what did u do?

I am having the same problem and when I try to force repatch with Hextech Repair Tool, the program crashes...
I got this problem right after I received a level 3 honor (the blue one)...
Please someone help...
After deleting the file "lockfile" it worked for me. Or it could be something on riot's end that changed in the meanwhile, I don't know.
The same happens to me... Anyone teach me how to change the DNS?
Hey guys, it got fixed for me in EUW. I think you should just wait as well till it gets fixed

What I did was turn back the clock on your computer several hours, and then back again. Worked like a charm for me.

Edit: It's stuck again, this does not work.

Hello, try to flush your DNS.
If you have Windows try the following: press Win+R and type in cmd, hit enter. 
Type ipconfig /flushdns and hit enter again.

> [{quoted}](name=IlDemi,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=2EAOEgbh,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-08-12T17:52:26.538+0000)
>
> Hello, try to flush your DNS.
> If you have Windows try the following: press Win+R and type in cmd, hit enter. 
> Type ipconfig /flushdns and hit enter again.

This worked for me guys!

*edit* nvm it got stuck again...

This is also happening to me. A loop of "okay" "restart" you know, for a billion dollar game producer Riot has really spaghetti coding. I, to this day cannot fathom how you can have so many errors and so many bugs and so many issues, when you are worth over a billion dollars as a whole. Perhaps, pay your coders more, or hire better coders, because this is mind-blowing.

It sounds like some setting with preventing game files from updating properly.  As a first step, go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access to game files.  Once completed, download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and perform a force repatch to get to the current version.  I hope that helps!

i tried that. i ran the hextech tool as an admin, i started the force update. right after it gathered the system logs and went on to the next task it crashed twice. what do i do now? im having the same exact problem as this guy. except i just got the newest arcade icon for the level 1 task that had boss veig on it. any help plz rito and ty.{{summoner:21}} {{summoner:4}}
Happening the same to me, I opened the file exe and started as administrator and it works :D. Thank you!
Been having this problem for the last hour as well, I have 2 days to till my lp starts decaying so... did anyone find a working solution?
